text: David Hywel Francis (6 June 1946 – 14 February 2021) was a Welsh politician and the Member of Parliament for the Aberavon constituency in the United Kingdom. He was elected in the 2001 General Election. He was a member of the Labour Party. == References == Category:1946 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Welsh historians Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Welsh constituencies Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015
title: Hywel Francis
